entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
